name: bacchus
description: Multi-agent coordination with persistent stop hooks. Agents keep working until beads are closed. Orchestrator spawns agents for ready work.
author: vu1n

bacchus-agent.description: Start a persistent agent on a bead. Agent keeps working until bead is closed.

bacchus-orchestrate.description: Start orchestrator that spawns agents for ready beads until all work is complete.

bacchus-cancel.description: Cancel active bacchus agents and orchestrator.
